review: I use this device on my guest room's TV.  Being I never wired this room for cable-TV, the Google Chromecast is perfect when we have guests stay over, as they're able to access Netflix and other streaming-based apps.  My one complaint is browser-based content streaming is not available.  Other than that, the device works especially well with NetFilx and YouTube.

review: It makes my wireless ping go through the roof. That is totally unacceptable when my brother and I play games on the same internet connection. It's great though if you have a laptop and want to watch a movie in a browser window, or need an easy way to show a youtube video.
author: Tony D.

review: I purchased this for travel and general use.  There is not a day that goes by where we don't throw something up from our computers in the office to the TV using Chromecast.  Great little device for the money!
author: Matt

review: I love using Chromecast! It's the cheapest and easiest way to connect a 'dumb' tv to all the streaming services (with the notable exception of Amazon Instant Video).When I first started using Chromecast, it was limited to a handful of apps. Now, though, it's an open API and developers can and do bake casting into their media apps. Netflix, HBO Prime, Plex and YouTube cover most of my media needs, and now they're all available on any TV thanks to Chromecast.
author: SMN
